home.title: Murakaza neza muri Mubwiza Garden
home.subtitle: Indabyo nziza, imboga, imbuto, icyayi n'ibimera byiza biva mu Ntara y'Amajyaruguru y'u Rwanda
home.aboutText1: Iherereye muri Kaminuza ya Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC) mu Karere ka Musanze, Intara y'Amajyaruguru y'u Rwanda, Mubwiza Garden ni isoko ryawe ry'ibicuruzwa by'ubusitani bwiza kandi bw'ireme.
home.aboutText2: Twitanze cyane cyane mu gutanga indabyo nziza zo gushushanya no gutanga impano, imboga n'imbuto kamere nziza, icyayi n'ibirungo byiza, n'ibimera byiza byo gufasha gutangira ubusitani bwawe.

products.title: Ibicuruzwa Byacu
products.tryAdjusting: Gerageza guhindura ibisabwa byawe cyangwa urebe ibicuruzwa byose

cart.title: Agasanduku k'Ubucuruzi
cart.emptyMessage: Shyira ibicuruzwa mu gasanduku kawe kugira ngo utangire
cart.paymentNote: Kwishyura bizateguwa nyuma yo kwemeza ibyo waguze

checkout.title: Kwishyura
checkout.addressHelper: Nyamuneka tanga aderesi yuzuye yo kohereza
checkout.paymentNote: Kwishyura bizateguwa nyuma yo kwemeza ibyo waguze

auth.signInMessage: Injira muri konti yawe ya Mubwiza Garden
auth.createAccount: Kora konti yawe kugira ngo utangire gucuruza

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Vugana na Mubwiza Garden - Turi hano kugufasha!
contact.phoneDesc: Duhamagare kugira ngo dufashe ako kanya
contact.bankTransfer: Kohereza mu Banki: Twandikire kugira ngo umenye amakuru
contact.cashOnDelivery: Kwishyura mu Gihe Bikoherezwa (mu Karere ka Musanze)
contact.paymentNote: Uburyo bwo kwishyura buzateguwa nyuma yo kwemeza ibyo waguze. Nyamuneka twandikire ukoresheje nimero ya telefoni iri hejuru kugira ngo dutegure kwishyura.
contact.subject: Ingingo

about.title: Ibibazo kuri Mubwiza Garden
about.subtitle: Guhinga ibicuruzwa bishya kandi kamere mu Rwanda
about.storyText1: Mubwiza Garden iherereye mu Ntara nziza y'Amajyaruguru y'u Rwanda, cyane cyane mu Karere ka Musanze muri Kaminuza ya Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC). Ubusitani bwacu bugaragaza ubwiyunge bw'ubuhinzi burambye no gutanga ibicuruzwa bishya kandi byiza ku muryango wacu.
about.storyText2: Twitanze cyane cyane mu guhinga ibicuruzwa bitandukanye birimo indabyo nziza zo gushushanya no gutanga impano, imboga n'imbuto kamere nziza, icyayi n'ibirungo byiza, n'ibimera byiza ku bafuza gutangira ubusitani bwabo.
about.storyText3: Intego yacu ni ugutanga ibicuruzwa by'ubusitani bishya kandi byiza cyane mu gihe dushyigikiye ubuhinzi burambye kandi dugira uruhare mu myiza y'abaturage b'aha.
about.flowersDesc: Indabyo nziza kandi nshya ku birori byose - kuva mu gushushanya kugeza ku mpano.
about.vegetablesDesc: Imboga kamere zihingwa hafi, zasaruwe mu gihe cyiza.
about.fruitsDesc: Imbuto nshya z'igihe zihingwa n'ubwitange mu busitani bwacu.
about.spicesDesc: Icyayi n'ibirungo byiza byo kongera uburyohe mu biryo byawe.
about.seedlingsDesc: Ibimera byiza byo gufasha gutangira ubusitani bwawe.
about.sustainabilityDesc: Dukoresha uburyo bw'ubuhinzi burambye burinda ibidukikije byacu ku bizaza.
about.communityDesc: Twiyemeje gushyigikira umuryango wacu w'aha kandi tugira uruhare mu iterambere ry'ubuhinzi mu Rwanda.
about.qualityDesc: Dufasha ubwiza bwo hejuru mu bicuruzwa byacu byose, kuva ku mbuto kugeza ku gasaruro kugeza ku meza yawe.

admin.manage: Genzura ibicuruzwa, ibyiciro n'ibyo baguze muri Mubwiza Garden
admin.welcome: Murakaza neza mu Buyobozi bwa Mubwiza Garden
admin.welcomeMessage: Koresha amasimbuka ari hejuru kugira ngo ugenzure ibicuruzwa, ibyiciro n'ibyo baguze. Impinduka zose zizagaragara ako kanya ku rubuga rwawe.

chat.title: Ganira na Mubwiza Garden
chat.welcome: Muraho! Murakaza neza muri Mubwiza Garden. Mwifuza dufashe iki uyu munsi?
chat.mobileMoneyInfo: Uburyo bwo kwishyura buzateguwa nyuma yo kwemeza ibyo waguze

footer.description: Iherereye mu Ntara y'Amajyaruguru y'u Rwanda, Karere ka Musanze muri Kaminuza ya Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC), dutanga indabyo nziza, imboga, imbuto, icyayi n'ibimera byiza.
